prod_name: Nate Basic S/S solid BB new
detail_desc: T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cold shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, gently draping silk with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Metal hoop earrings with pearly plastic beads.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knitted all-in-one suit with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hems. Soft, thermal fleece inside. The polyester content of the suit is partly recycled.

Trousers in rustle-weave nylon with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly and press-stud and low crotch. Back and leg pockets with a flap and press-studs, diagonal side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Metal earrings with polished sparkly stones. Length 2.5 cm.
Iron-on fabric patches to patch and repair garments.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Jacket in soft cotton twill with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped side pockets and a press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with seams. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Short top in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and a zip down the front.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar and lace-trimmed button placket. Long sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a lace seam at the knees with decorative gathers. Jersey underdress.
Platform sandals in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Jeans in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight-cut hems.
Sleeveless jersey dress with a shimmering metallic pattern, straps that cross at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit with embroidery on the front and 3/4-length sleeves with ribbed flounces at the cuffs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length trousers in ribbed jersey with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, frills at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the bust for extra support. Gathers at the sides for best fit.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with embroidery and a collar. Buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit modal blend containing some wool with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long satin dress with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed fastenings. Short butterfly sleeves, a tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides of the skirt.

Fitted top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a cotton weave. Square neckline front and back and elasticated edges over the shoulders and around the sleeves.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Short, fitted dungaree dress in stretch twill with a zip down the front and straps with adjustable metal fasteners. Soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle and a flap front pocket with a button. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut edges and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Narrow, braided belts with a round metal buckle. One in imitation leather and one in imitation suede. Width 1.5 cm.
Metal hair grips with glass rhinestones. Length 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif, chest pocket, narrow ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button and zip fly. Elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed drawstring, side pockets, a zipped welt back pocket, and short slits in the sides of the hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck, wrapover bodice, tie detail at the side, seam at the waist and gently flared peplum.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with a wide, square neckline and a smocked back. Short sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the hems, and smocking at the front of the hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Suede shoes with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a contrasting colour welt seam around the sole. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.
Short off-the-shoulder top in an airy weave with a sheen. Elastication at the top, long sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Plastic smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/7.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Zip at the back, dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Soft, non-wired bra in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The cups are lined in with fabric made from recycled polyester.
Glasses with plastic frames and transparent lenses in printed plastic.
Wide, sleeveless top in a rib knit with a V-neck front and back, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and deep, gathered armholes.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a tab and button, and slits in the sides.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a fastening at the top, a lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back, short, flounced sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
